headline: Inverse Cramer Wins Again: Opposite Picks Of Investor Beat Nancy Pelosi In 2025
summary: When it comes to following stock picks of famous individuals, Jim Cramer and Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) are two of the most well-known people. A financial company that allows investors to invest alongside both individuals has crowned a 2025 winner and the answer may be surprising. Jim Cramer Vs. Nancy Pelosi 2025 Stock Picks Battle Former Speaker of the House Pelosi regularly discloses stock trades each year that are made by her husband Paul Pelosi.
